source.e4f9d496:
#The number of trips per day

source.c8313abf:
#What is the frequence of the business ?
df.Category.value_counts().plot(kind='bar',figsize=(15,10))
source.8c275542:
#What is the number of trips per month?
df.groupby(['Month'])['Category'].count().sort_values(ascending=False).plot(kind='bar',figsize=(15,10),title="Number of trips per month")
source.1a2685f2:
#What is the number of trips per day?
df.groupby(['Day'])['Category'].count().sort_values(ascending=False).plot(kind='bar',title='Number of trip per day',figsize=(15,10))
